Key Match Events: The match was abandoned without a ball bowled due to heavy rain
Pre-Game Insights: USA had begun their campaign with a victory against Canada in Dallas, and then they upset Pakistan in a Super Over to become strong contenders to qualify for the Super Eight
Post-Match Reflections: O'Brien: USA deserve to be in the Super Eight
USA have qualified for the Super Eight stage in their maiden T20 World Cup appearance
Miscellaneous Highlights: The result also secured USA's place in the next T20 World Cup in 2026
Friday's washout eliminated Pakistan, Canada and Ireland from Group A
Others: The outfield in Lauderhill was extremely wet on Friday morning
There was heavy rain in Florida all week
